item.description:
It's Spring so lets head out into the woods for some disc tossing and exercise. Disc golf is fun to learn. Come on out and give it a try or just join me. You don't have to be good,just try it. I have 6 discs that I can lend out. If you have your own or some that you can lend, please bring them. If you want to use a frisbee that will work. We won't be keeping score. Just tossing, chatting and having a good time.

Bring good shoes, water and a snack. The store across the street may have changed so I can't tell you if any lunch is available just yet.

Here is a link to the park for info.  http://www.dgcoursereview.com/course.php?id=4935

 

My number for questions 603-315-0275

**PLEASE let me know if you will be needing a disc or can lend an extra! I only have 6 to lend.


***Please only YES rsvp's ..thanks and see you sunday !
item.how_to_find_us: meet me by the entrance in the back of he park, past the playground. I have a tan Grand Caravan with Petart on the plate.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Disc Golf
